reviewText: Grandkids loved the video. I am just a kid at heart, so I liked it too. My library didn't have this volume, so I purchased it for my grandkids.
We saw the digital animation movie first, and my son watches the DVD over-and-over.  So, we had to get this series.  He loves it!

My six year son and I love this European cartoon series.  The characters are fun, the landscapes amazing, the stories interesting.  This was a pleasant surprise and highly recommend the series to anyones.
